author: Jude064
title: A little pocket of luxury
text:
We have stayed twice in this quaint boutique hotel. I think it will become our go-to place for Paris. It's an old building on a small street so don't expect big rooms. But what they do pack into the space is very well-designed and delivered. The welcome and service are friendly and helpful. The furnishings are beautiful and really classy. Everything works well and there are nice touches like an honesty bar where you can fix a drink or make yourself a cup of tea when you come in. They didn't have decaf coffee and the lift is tiny but otherwise no faults. It doesn't do dinners but there are several good restaurants very close.
